item.title: Amazon is reportedly in talks to invest $50 billion in OpenAI
item.description: If a deal materializes, it would mean Amazon is backing competing startups in the race for AI supremacy.

item.title: Medium gives employees Friday off to participate in national strike protesting ICE
item.description: Activists behind the general strike are calling for "no work, no school, and no shopping" amid a push to defund ICE, which has escalated raids in U.S....

item.title: Microsoft won’t stop buying AI chips from Nvidia, AMD, even after launching its own, Nadella says
item.description: Microsoft says its own chip leapfrogs those made by other cloud providers like Amazon and Google. But it needs more.

item.title: Fintech firm Marquis blames hack at firewall provider SonicWall for its data breach
item.description: The fintech giant said it plans to "seek recoupment of any expenses" from its firewall provider SonicWall after a 2025 data breach exposed customer fi...

item.title: Satya Nadella insists people are using Microsoft’s Copilot AI a lot
item.description: With Microsoft spending many billions on data centers, and rumors that no one is using its AI, CEO Satya Nadella shared some usage numbers.
